alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Campbell (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 12:32PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Anderson and south central Campbell Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 132 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jacksboro, or 9 miles south of La Follette, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Jacksboro, Caryville, Rocky Top, Norris, Norris Dam State Park, Disney and Cove Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
